title: Family Fun Homemade Holidays
description: From the creators of FamilyFun Tricks and Treats comes a collection of celebration inspirations for the winter holiday season. The winter holidays are a magical time, especially for families with youngsters. FamilyFun Homemade Holidays proivdes an inexhaustible guide to planning one of the most important holiday seasons of the year. This sixth book in our best-selling series features games, activiites, decorations, tested recipes, and complete Christmas, Hanukkah, and Kwanzaa party plans, plus winter holiday ideas from FamilyFun readers, timesaving tips, and step-by-step photographs. This volume is further proof that there is no greater authority on new and fun ways to pass the time than the experts at FamilyFun.
author: Deanna F. Cook
